title: Ticket #4199: GitTrac:Only show users with Check-in permission in Assigned To field.
description:
The "Assigned To" list is all registered users, and is getting unwieldy. We don't want to delete users who are not longer active as it mucks up the history (especially if we delete "bob", and a year later a different person claims the "bob" account). To keep the list trim, we'll limit it to users with the "Check-In" capability, which we overload to mean "has signed the contributor's agreement." In general, those should be the only people owning tickets anyway.

Places to change (hopefully they all share a single SQL statement):

  • Create A New Ticket - https://htcondor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/tktnew
  • Edit Ticket - https://htcondor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/tktedit?tn=1
